comment: Think before you post & tweet tonight . Remember there is a fine line between voicing your opinion & having a bit of banter versus cyber bullying & online trolling . The Islanders are real people so remember its nice to be nice ! <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Think before you post & tweet tonight . Remember there is a fine line between voicing your opinion & having a bit of banter versus cyber bullying & online trolling . The Islanders are real people so remember its nice to be nice ! <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / think-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p / post-01
                              :ARG0 y)
                        :op2 (t2 / tweet-02
                              :ARG0 y)
                        :time (d / date-entity
                              :dayperiod (n / night)
                              :mod (t3 / today)))))
      :snt2 (r / remember-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (l / line
                  :ARG1-of (f / fine-04)
                  :mod (b2 / between
                        :op1 (v / voice-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :ARG1 (o / opine-01
                                    :ARG0 y2))
                        :op2 (b3 / banter-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :quant (b4 / bit))
                        :ARG1-of (c / compare-01
                              :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (b5 / bully-01
                                          :mod (c2 / cyber))
                                    :op2 (t4 / troll-01
                                          :medium (o2 / online)))))))
      :snt3 (p2 / person
            :mod (ii / island
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Islanders"))
            :ARG1-of (r2 / real-04)
            :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (r3 / remember-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                        :ARG1 (n3 / nice-01
                              :ARG1 (n4 / nice-01))))))

comment: Hey Keith , has Mr Best found you on your new account ? Great times
amr:
# ::snt Hey Keith , has Mr Best found you on your new account ? Great times
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hey)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Keith")))
      :snt2 (f / find-01
            :ARG0 p
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Mr"
                  :op2 "Best"))
      :ARG1 p
      :location (a / account
            :poss p
            :ARG1-of (n3 / new-01))
      :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)
      :snt3 (t / time
            :mod (g / great)))
